body_html: These extensions (index_max_(), index_min_(), index_mean_(), etc.) would also allow for efficient pooling functionality over unordered or non-uniformly-shaped data, which can be helpful for some tasks.
body_text: These extensions (index_max_(),  index_min_(), index_mean_(), etc.) would also allow for efficient pooling functionality over unordered or non-uniformly-shaped data, which can be helpful for some tasks.
body: These extensions (`index_max_()`,  `index_min_()`, `index_mean_()`, etc.) would also allow for efficient pooling functionality over unordered or non-uniformly-shaped data, which can be helpful for some tasks.
